The game's functions are mostly icon-controlled and all the pictures are pretty self-explanatory. On hongfire there's an English install (although the game's text itself is still in Japanese) and an uncensored patch that you can add on. Here's the links:

English Install:
(http://www.hongfire[DOT]com/forum/showthread.php?t=85886 )

Uncensored Patch:
(http://www.hongfire[DOT]com/forum/showthread.php?t=85581&p=1547516#post1547516 )

Replace the [DOT] with a period to view the links.
does this work with mac? or is there any other mac-games out there?

It works, got it running of windows 7 ultimate x64. Running as administrator and in compatibility mode (windows XP service pack 3) Don't know if you have to actually run it with that but i am just to be safe. Just follow the instructions (they are pretty easy to follow) make sure you hold the F button for full screen or W for windowed. the game won't play if  you don't.
addendum, forgot to mention you hold F or W before you click on ObsDX9 to run the game, let go once it starts
